projects.title: FormKiQ
projects.description:
Document Management Platform. 
 
 Utilized React, Typescript, Redux, Tailwind, and other technologies to implement new functionalities, such as enabling the creation of archives and displaying user activities. Engineered an intuitive front-end interface for interactive drag-and-drop workflows utilizing the React Flow library.

projects.title: Royal Path
projects.description:
React Native game with tinder-swipe mechanics. 
 
 As a monarch, navigate advisors, villagers, allies, and foes! Choose to battle or befriend mystical creatures. Strengthen your army or pursue diplomacy. Shape your kingdom's destiny!

projects.title: Voidverse Studios
projects.description:
Game Development Studio landing page. 
 
 Build with Next.js 13 to optimize content loading, improve SEO with server-side rendering. Animations done with Framer Motion.

projects.title: Timer App
projects.description: Gamified productivity timer. Build with Python (Flask), HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, JS, and SQLite. User can choose a time, start, pause and stop the timer. Collect new animals on your field by reaching new milestones.
